title: Spanish Gold and Silver Map - Effect

content.prompt: Which of the following developments resulted from the situation depicted in the map?

choices.label: Spanish colonists excluded native populations from Spanish colonial society.
Native American populations developed increasingly complex societies.
An exchange of goods and people emerged between Europe, Africa, and the Americas.
The Spanish prohibited missionaries from spreading Christianity among native populations.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
